news.title: 墨西哥头号毒枭“门乔”在军事行动中被击毙
news.title0: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
news.content: 墨西哥军方在一次安全行动中击毙了该国头号通缉犯、哈利斯科新一代贩毒集团（CJNG）的领导人“门乔”。
news.content0: Mexico's most wanted man and the leader of the feared Jalisco New Generation (CJNG) drug cartel has been killed during a security operation to arrest him, the  defence ministry has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普质疑伊朗为何未“屈服”于军事压力
news.title0: Trump curious why Iran has not 'capitulated', US envoy Witkoff says
news.content: 美国总统特朗普的特使表示，特朗普对伊朗在美国军事集结面前仍未“屈服”感到好奇。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump is questioning why Iran has not yet "capitulated" in the face of Washington's military build-up in the Middle East, the US president's special envoy Steve Witkoff has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 格陵兰拒绝特朗普派出的“医院船”援助
news.title0: Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump US hospital boat
news.content: 格陵兰总理拒绝了特朗普派出的“医院船”，称其拥有全民免费医疗体系，并呼吁特朗普直接对话。
news.content0: Greenland's prime minister has asked US President Donald Trump to talk to him instead of making "random outbursts on social media", after Trump said he was sending a US hospital boat to "take care" of people on the island.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 武装男子闯入特朗普海湖庄园被击毙
news.title0: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
news.content: 一名携带霰弹枪和燃料罐的男子闯入特朗普海湖庄园的安全警戒区，被特勤局人员击毙。
news.content0: An armed man has been shot dead after entering the secure perimeter of US President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago residence in Florida, the Secret Service has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 历史性强冬季风暴袭击美国东北部，纽约发布旅行禁令
news.title0: Powerful winter storm targets US northeast as NYC issues travel ban
news.content: 一场历史性冬季风暴袭击美国东北部，纽约市发布全面旅行禁令，5400万人受暴风雪警告影响。
news.content0: A historic winter storm has placed 54 million people under blizzard warnings and prompted travel restrictions in multiple areas, including a travel ban New York City.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美驻以大使涉领土言论遭阿拉伯国家谴责
news.title0: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
news.content: 美国驻以色列大使暗示以色列可依据《圣经》占领大片中东土地的言论，遭十余个阿拉伯和穆斯林国家联合谴责。
news.content0: Arab and Muslim governments have condemned remarks made by the US Ambassador to Israel, Mike Huckabee, who suggested Israel would be justified in taking over a vast stretch of the Middle East on Biblical grounds.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布朗要求警方调查安德鲁是否用军事基地会面爱泼斯坦
news.title0: Brown urges police probe into whether Andrew used RAF bases to meet Epstein
news.content: 英国前首相戈登·布朗要求警方调查安德鲁是否曾使用纳税人资助的飞机和皇家空军基地与爱泼斯坦会面。
news.content0: Gordon Brown has demanded a police investigation into whether Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor used taxpayer-funded jets and RAF bases to meet the paedophile Jeffrey Epstein, according to reports.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国队为纪念逝去队友赢得历史性冰球金牌
news.title0: Winning it for Johnny Hockey: Team USA wins a historic gold and honors a fallen teammate
news.content: 美国男子冰球队在米兰冬奥会决赛中击败加拿大，赢得自“冰上奇迹”后的首枚金牌，以此纪念逝去的队友。
news.content0: Outside the arena here, it felt like all of Canada had arrived, not so much for a hockey game but for a statement.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 社交媒体成瘾案开审，扎克伯格首次出庭作证
news.title0: A ‘bellwether’ social media addiction trial is underway. It could set off a chain reaction
news.content: Meta CEO扎克伯格首次就社交媒体危害青少年指控出庭作证，此案可能引发科技行业的“大烟草时刻”。
news.content0: Big Tech may be on the verge of its Big Tobacco moment.
news.author: CNN
